original_title: I Love You Three Times a Day
overview: An english high school teacher where his students always play tricks on him because of his carabao english. He met and fell in love with a fellow teacher which he didn't know was engage to be married. Frustrated and tried to kill himself there appeared his fairy god mother telling him he'll just say the phrase "I Love You 3x A Day" if he wants somebody to fall in love with him.
title: I Love You Three Times a Day
